channel.title: Advertisement: Luzoxpk server (317 server)
channel.description:
[size=36pt] Luzoxpk[/size]
[size=10pt]Forums: [/size][size=10pt][url=http://luzoxpk.com/]http://luzoxpk.pk.com/[/url][/size][size=10pt] ( you will find the desktop client on the forums under the 'download'section)[/size]
Webclient: [url=http://www.luzoxpk.ipbhost.com/webclient/]http://www.luzoxpk.ipbhost.com/webclient/[/url]
[u]Why join luzoxpk?[/u] This server is still fresh, so alot of updates are on its way! The economy is awesome and the owner/admins/staff are always friendly! when you hear the name Luzox'pk' you might think it is all about pk'ing, but is certainly not! Like I said the server is still very new and needs players! So why not join? [u] Some features:[/u] Dicing (this makes you able to gamble, command is ::dice) ::Barrows minigame ::Pits (sort of last man standing, includes reward) ::funpk (when you die, you keep your items) ::shops ::boss ::pk and lots more!
[u] Bosses (pvm):[/u] Kree arra Graardor King black dragon Kalphite queen Chaos elemental flambeed
[u] Extra:[/u] Pkp shop Target point shop Donator shop Ticket shop Weekly accessories Barker shop (discontinued items) And lots more!
[u]Skills added:[/u] Runecrafting fletching thieving herblore crafting mining smithing fishing cooking firemaking and woodcutting
Images: [img]http://i.imgur.com/N7zaQCZ.jpg?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zh8umLD.jpg?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UWDR4Qb.jpg?1[/img]
Ofcourse there is so much more to discover!
So if you think the server looks cool, come and check it out!
I hope i'll see you there!

item.title: Advertisement: Luzoxpk server (317 server)
item.dc:creator: @tiptr0nic tiptr0nic
item.description:
@tiptr0nic wrote:

[size=36pt] Luzoxpk[/size]

[size=10pt]Forums: [/size][size=10pt]http://luzoxpk.pk.com/[/size][size=10pt] ( you will find the desktop client on the forums under the 'download’section)[/size]

Webclient: http://www.luzoxpk.ipbhost.com/webclient/

Why join luzoxpk?
This server is still fresh, so alot of updates are on its way! The economy is awesome and the owner/admins/staff are always friendly! when you hear the name Luzox’pk’ you might think it is all about pk’ing, but is certainly not! Like I said the server is still very new and needs players! So why not join?

Some features:
Dicing (this makes you able to gamble, command is ::dice)
::Barrows minigame
::Pits (sort of last man standing, includes reward)
::funpk (when you die, you keep your items)
::shops
::boss
::pk
and lots more!


Bosses (pvm):
Kree arra
Graardor
King black dragon
Kalphite queen
Chaos elemental
flambeed


Extra:
Pkp shop
Target point shop
Donator shop
Ticket shop
Weekly accessories
Barker shop (discontinued items)
And lots more!

Skills added:
Runecrafting
fletching
thieving
herblore
crafting
mining
smithing
fishing
cooking
firemaking
and woodcutting

Images:

N7zaQCZ.jpg?1754×496

zh8umLD.jpg?1749×489

UWDR4Qb.jpg?1759×503

Ofcourse there is so much more to discover!

So if you think the server looks cool, come and check it out!

I hope i’ll see you there!
